snippet.title: MIO: Memories In Orbit - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Play an android in MIO: Memories in Orbit, a mesmerizing metroidvania where you explore the Vessel, an enormous technological ark overgrown with machines gone rogue.

Nobody knows why the Pearls, its AI caretakers, have ceased functioning…
Uncover its secrets, enhance MIO's abilities, and save the spaceship and its resident from oblivion! 💫

Available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC and Nintendo Switch in 2025.

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1672810?utm_campaign=MIO_RevealTrailer&utm_medium=post&utm_source=YouTube
